channel.title: Help With Client
channel.description: Well i will make this simple i downloaded jdk, and now when i go to compile my server or client it say's i need jdk 5.0 or 6.0 which i do have :confused: i am clueless please could i have some help?

item.title: Help With Client
item.dc:creator: @benzo_yay benzo yay
item.description:
@benzo_yay wrote:

yay i got it sorted now it works!!@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
Hope it helps.

Read full topic

item.title: Help With Client
item.dc:creator: @Tenacious_T Tenacious T
item.description:
@Tenacious_T wrote:

Go to start>my computer>local disc>program files>Java and see what the folders say, and tell me.
